metadata.description: Comprehensive synthetic dataset for e-commerce AI voicebot including products, orders, policies, FAQs, and voice query scenarios

products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and superior sound quality. Features include touch controls, voice assistant integration, and comfortable over-ear design.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch Ultra
products.description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 50+ workout modes. Water-resistant up to 50 meters with 7-day battery life.

products.name: Organic Cotton Bath Towel Set
products.description: Luxurious 6-piece towel set made from 100% organic cotton. Ultra-soft, highly absorbent, and quick-drying. Set includes 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, and 2 washcloths.

products.name: Stainless Steel Coffee Maker Deluxe
products.description: Programmable 12-cup coffee maker with thermal carafe, auto-brew timer, and adjustable strength settings. Features a permanent gold-tone filter and auto shut-off.

products.name: Yoga Mat Premium Non-Slip
products.description: Extra-thick 6mm yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly TPE material, lightweight and easy to clean. Includes carrying strap.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging
products.description: Modern LED desk lamp with 5 brightness levels and 3 color temperatures. Features USB charging port, touch controls, and adjustable arm. Energy-efficient and eye-caring.

products.name: Backpack Laptop Travel Pro
products.description: Durable water-resistant backpack with dedicated laptop compartment (fits up to 17 inch), USB charging port, and anti-theft design. Multiple compartments for organization.

products.name: Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set
products.description: 10-piece ceramic non-stick cookware set including frying pans, saucepans, and stockpot. PFOA-free, dishwasher safe, and compatible with all stovetops including induction.

products.name: Electric Standing Desk Converter
products.description: Electric height-adjustable standing desk converter with memory presets. Smooth and quiet motor, spacious work surface, and cable management. Supports up to 35 lbs.

products.name: Smart Home Security Camera System
products.description: 2-camera wireless security system with 1080p HD video, night vision, two-way audio, and motion detection. Cloud and local storage options. Works with Alexa and Google Assistant.

products.name: Men's Cotton Casual Shirt - Blue
products.description: Classic fit casual shirt made from 100% cotton. Features button-down collar, chest pocket, and breathable fabric. Perfect for everyday wear or casual office settings.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Formal Dress Shirt - White
products.description: Premium formal dress shirt with wrinkle-resistant fabric. Features French cuffs, spread collar, and slim fit design. Ideal for business meetings and formal events.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash warm, hang dry

products.name: Men's Checkered Flannel Shirt
products.description: Comfortable flannel shirt with classic checkered pattern. Soft brushed fabric perfect for cooler weather. Features button closure and two chest pockets.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Slim Fit Chino Pants - Khaki
products.description: Versatile chino pants with slim fit design. Made from stretch cotton blend for comfort and flexibility. Features zip fly, button closure, and side pockets.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Classic Fit Jeans - Dark Blue
products.description: Classic straight-leg jeans made from premium denim. Features five-pocket styling, belt loops, and durable construction. Timeless design for everyday wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry medium

products.name: Men's Cargo Pants - Gray
products.description: Functional cargo pants with multiple pockets and reinforced stitching. Made from durable ripstop fabric. Perfect for outdoor activities and casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Graphic T-Shirt - Black
products.description: Comfortable cotton t-shirt with trendy graphic print. Crew neck design with short sleeves. Pre-shrunk fabric ensures lasting fit.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's V-Neck Basic T-Shirt - White
products.description: Classic v-neck t-shirt made from soft, breathable cotton. Perfect layering piece or standalone essential. Available in multiple colors.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Polo T-Shirt - Navy
products.description: Classic polo shirt with ribbed collar and cuffs. Made from pique cotton for breathability. Features three-button placket and side vents.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Athletic Shorts - Black
products.description: Lightweight athletic shorts with moisture-wicking fabric. Features elastic waistband with drawstring, side pockets, and mesh lining. Perfect for gym or running.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Cargo Shorts - Khaki
products.description: Durable cargo shorts with multiple pockets for storage. Made from cotton blend fabric. Features zip fly, button closure, and belt loops.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Denim Shorts - Light Blue
products.description: Classic denim shorts with distressed finish. Features five-pocket styling and frayed hem. Perfect for summer casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry medium

products.name: Men's Pullover Hoodie - Gray
products.description: Cozy pullover hoodie with soft fleece lining. Features drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for layering or lounging.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Zip-Up Hoodie - Black
products.description: Full-zip hoodie with modern fit. Features two side pockets, adjustable hood, and durable zipper. Great for gym or casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Graphic Hoodie - Navy
products.description: Trendy graphic hoodie with bold print design. Made from soft cotton blend. Features drawstring hood and front pouch pocket.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Jogger Track Pants - Black
products.description: Comfortable jogger style track pants with tapered fit. Features elastic waistband with drawstring, side pockets, and ankle cuffs. Perfect for workouts or lounging.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Classic Track Pants - Navy
products.description: Traditional track pants with side stripe detail. Made from moisture-wicking fabric. Features elastic waistband, drawstring, and side pockets.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Fleece Track Pants - Gray
products.description: Warm fleece-lined track pants for cold weather. Features elastic waistband with drawstring, side pockets, and ankle cuffs. Soft brushed interior for extra comfort.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Men's Running Shoes - Black/White
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with breathable mesh upper and cushioned sole. Features responsive foam midsole, rubber outsole for traction, and padded collar for comfort.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

products.name: Men's Athletic Training Shoes - Gray
products.description: Versatile training shoes designed for gym workouts. Features stable platform, flexible forefoot, and durable construction. Ideal for weightlifting and cross-training.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

products.name: Men's Basketball Shoes - Red/Black
products.description: High-performance basketball shoes with excellent ankle support. Features air cushioning, herringbone traction pattern, and durable leather upper.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

products.name: Men's Leather Dress Shoes - Brown
products.description: Premium leather oxford shoes perfect for formal occasions. Features genuine leather upper, cushioned insole, and classic lace-up design. Polished finish for professional look.

specifications.care_instructions: Polish regularly, keep dry

products.name: Men's Leather Loafers - Black
products.description: Stylish leather loafers with slip-on design. Features soft leather lining, cushioned footbed, and flexible rubber sole. Perfect for business casual or smart casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Polish regularly, keep dry

products.name: Men's Leather Boots - Dark Brown
products.description: Durable leather boots with ankle support. Features premium full-grain leather, padded collar, and oil-resistant sole. Suitable for work or casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Clean and condition leather regularly

products.name: Men's Casual Sandals - Brown
products.description: Comfortable casual sandals with adjustable straps. Features cushioned footbed, EVA midsole, and durable rubber outsole. Perfect for summer and outdoor activities.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

products.name: Men's Sports Sandals - Black
products.description: Rugged sports sandals designed for outdoor adventures. Features quick-dry webbing, contoured footbed, and multi-directional traction. Water-friendly and durable.

specifications.care_instructions: Rinse with water after use

products.name: Men's Slide Sandals - Navy
products.description: Simple slide sandals for casual wear. Features soft footbed, single strap design, and lightweight construction. Perfect for pool, beach, or lounging.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

products.name: Men's Flip Flops - Black
products.description: Classic flip flops with comfortable thong design. Features soft rubber straps, cushioned footbed, and textured sole for grip. Essential summer footwear.

specifications.care_instructions: Rinse with water

products.name: Men's Premium Rubber Slippers - Brown
products.description: Durable rubber slippers with contoured footbed. Features anti-slip sole, comfortable straps, and water-resistant design. Perfect for daily wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Rinse with water

products.name: Men's Indoor House Slippers - Gray
products.description: Cozy indoor slippers with soft plush lining. Features memory foam footbed, slip-resistant sole, and closed-toe design. Ideal for home use.

specifications.care_instructions: Hand wash cold, air dry

products.name: Men's Leather Belt - Black
products.description: Classic leather belt with metal buckle. Made from genuine leather with stitched edges. Versatile design suitable for formal and casual wear.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean, condition leather

products.name: Men's Reversible Belt - Brown/Black
products.description: Reversible leather belt offering two colors in one. Features rotating buckle mechanism, genuine leather construction, and versatile design.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean, condition leather

products.name: Men's Casual Canvas Belt - Navy
products.description: Durable canvas belt with D-ring buckle. Features woven cotton canvas, adjustable length, and casual style. Perfect for jeans and casual pants.

specifications.care_instructions: Machine wash cold

products.name: Men's Braided Leather Belt - Tan
products.description: Handcrafted braided leather belt with unique texture. Features woven leather strands, metal buckle, and stylish design. Adds character to any outfit.

specifications.care_instructions: Wipe clean, condition leather

order_statuses.description: Order has been received and payment is being verified
Order is being prepared for shipment
Order has been shipped and is in transit
Order has been delivered to the destination
Order has been returned by customer

shipping_policy.title: Shipping and Delivery Policy
shipping_policy.content: ShopEase is committed to delivering your orders quickly and efficiently. We offer multiple shipping options to meet your needs.

shipping_methods.name: Standard Shipping
shipping_methods.cost: $5.99 for orders under $50, FREE for orders $50 and above

shipping_methods.name: International Shipping
shipping_methods.cost: Varies by destination, calculated at checkout

shipping_policy.processing_time: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed the next business day.
shipping_policy.tracking: Once your order ships, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information. You can track your package using the tracking number provided or through your account dashboard.
shipping_policy.delivery_issues: If your package shows as delivered but you haven't received it, please check with neighbors or building management. Contact us within 48 hours if you still cannot locate your package.
shipping_policy.address_changes: Address changes can be made up to 2 hours after order placement. After this time, please contact customer service immediately. We cannot guarantee address changes once the order has been shipped.
shipping_policy.po_boxes: We ship to PO boxes for standard shipping only. Express and overnight shipping are not available for PO box addresses.

return_policy.title: Returns and Refunds Policy
return_policy.content: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your order, we offer a hassle-free return policy.
return_policy.return_window: 30 days from the date of delivery
eligibility: Items must be unused and in original condition
Items must be in original packaging with all tags attached
Items must include all accessories, manuals, and documentation
Items marked as final sale or clearance are not eligible for return
return_process: Log into your account and navigate to Order History
Select the order containing items you wish to return
Click 'Return Items' and select the items and reason for return
Print the prepaid return shipping label
Pack items securely in original packaging if possible
Attach the return label and drop off at any authorized carrier location
return_policy.return_shipping_cost: Return shipping is FREE for defective items or shipping errors. For all other returns, a $6.99 return shipping fee will be deducted from your refund. Express returns are available for an additional fee.
return_policy.refund_processing: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned item. The refund will be issued to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 additional business days for the refund to appear in your account.
return_policy.exchanges: We do not offer direct exchanges. If you need a different size, color, or item, please return the original item for a refund and place a new order.
return_policy.damaged_or_defective: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us within 7 days of delivery with photos. We will provide a prepaid return label and issue a full refund or replacement at no cost to you.
return_policy.late_returns: Returns initiated after 30 days may be accepted at our discretion and may be subject to a 20% restocking fee.
return_policy.international_returns: International customers are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees. We recommend using a trackable shipping service.

warranty_policy.title: Product Warranty Policy
warranty_policy.content: Many of our products come with manufacturer warranties. Warranty terms vary by product and brand.
warranty_policy.standard_warranty: Most electronics and appliances include a 1-2 year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship.
warranty_claims: Warranty claims must be initiated within the warranty period
Proof of purchase is required for all warranty claims
Contact our customer service team to initiate a warranty claim
Defective items may need to be returned for inspection
Warranty does not cover damage from misuse, accidents, or normal wear and tear
warranty_policy.extended_warranty: Extended warranty protection is available for purchase on eligible items at checkout. Extended warranties provide coverage beyond the manufacturer warranty period.
warranty_policy.warranty_contact: For warranty questions or claims, email warranty@shopease.com or call 1-800-SHOP-EASE.

payment_policy.title: Payment and Pricing Policy
payment_policy.pricing: All prices are in USD and are subject to change without notice. We make every effort to ensure pricing accuracy, but errors may occur. If we discover a pricing error after you've placed an order, we will contact you for instructions.
payment_policy.payment_security: We use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We do not store complete credit card information on our servers.
payment_policy.billing: You will be charged when your order is processed, typically within 24 hours of order placement. For pre-orders, you will be charged when the item ships.
payment_policy.sales_tax: Sales tax is calculated based on your shipping address and applicable state and local tax rates.
payment_policy.promotional_codes: Promotional codes and discounts cannot be combined unless explicitly stated. Codes must be entered at checkout and cannot be applied to past orders. Codes have expiration dates and terms that will be specified in the promotion details.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy_policy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information.
privacy_policy.information_usage: We use your information to process orders, communicate with you, improve our services, and provide personalized experiences. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy_policy.data_security: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
privacy_policy.cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacy_policy.opt_out: You can opt out of marketing communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or updating your preferences in your account settings.

customer_service_policy.title: Customer Service and Support
customer_service_policy.service_commitment: We are committed to providing excellent customer service. Our team is trained to assist you with orders, returns, product questions, and any other concerns.
customer_service_policy.complaint_resolution: If you are not satisfied with our service, please ask to speak with a supervisor or manager. We take all complaints seriously and will work to resolve issues promptly.

product_availability.title: Product Availability and Backorders
product_availability.stock_status: Product availability is updated in real-time on our website. However, inventory changes rapidly, and items may sell out between the time you add them to your cart and complete checkout.
product_availability.out_of_stock: If an item goes out of stock after you place your order, we will contact you within 24 hours to offer alternatives or cancel that portion of your order.
product_availability.backorders: Some items may be available for backorder. Backordered items will ship as soon as they become available. You will not be charged for backordered items until they ship.
product_availability.pre_orders: Pre-order items will have an estimated ship date listed on the product page. Pre-order dates are subject to change. You will be charged when the item ships.

terms_and_conditions.title: General Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.acceptance: By placing an order or using our website, you agree to these terms and conditions.
terms_and_conditions.age_requirement: You must be at least 18 years old to make a purchase on our website.
terms_and_conditions.account_responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_and_conditions.prohibited_use: You may not use our website for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these terms.
terms_and_conditions.intellectual_property: All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights.
terms_and_conditions.limitation_of_liability: ShopEase is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or products.
terms_and_conditions.modifications: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website.
terms_and_conditions.governing_law: These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, United States.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: To place an order, browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to provide shipping and payment information. Once your order is confirmed, you'll receive an email confirmation with your order details and order number.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
questions.answer: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placement by contacting our customer service team immediately. Once an order enters processing or has been shipped, we cannot guarantee modifications or cancellations. However, you can always return items within 30 days of delivery.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and ShopEase Gift Cards. All payments are processed securely using SSL encryption.

questions.question: Do you offer price matching?
questions.answer: Currently, we do not offer price matching. However, we regularly run promotions and sales. Sign up for our newsletter to receive notifications about special offers and discounts.

questions.question: Can I use multiple promo codes on one order?
questions.answer: Generally, only one promotional code can be used per order unless explicitly stated otherwise. Promo codes cannot be applied to past orders and must be entered at checkout before completing your purchase.

questions.question: How long does shipping take?
questions.answer: Shipping times depend on the method you choose. Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, Express shipping takes 2-3 business days, and Overnight shipping arrives in 1 business day. Orders typically process within 1-2 business days before shipping. International shipping takes 10-21 business days depending on the destination.

questions.question: How much does shipping cost?
questions.answer: Standard shipping costs $5.99 for orders under $50 and is FREE for orders $50 and above. Express shipping is $12.99 and overnight shipping is $24.99. International shipping costs vary by destination and are calculated at checkout.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to select international destinations. International shipping takes 10-21 business days and costs vary by location. Please note that international orders may be subject to customs fees and import duties, which are the responsibility of the customer.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can track your package by entering the tracking number on the carrier's website or by logging into your ShopEase account and viewing your order history. Tracking information updates every 24 hours.

questions.question: What if my package is lost or stolen?
questions.answer: If tracking shows your package was delivered but you didn't receive it, first check with neighbors and building management. Contact us within 48 hours if you cannot locate it. For packages confirmed lost by the carrier, we will file a claim and issue a replacement or refund. We are not responsible for stolen packages after confirmed delivery.

questions.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
questions.answer: Address changes can be made within 2 hours of order placement by contacting customer service immediately. Once the order has shipped, we cannot change the delivery address. You may need to contact the shipping carrier directly to request an address change or hold for pickup.

questions.question: Do you ship to PO boxes?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to PO boxes using Standard shipping only. Express and Overnight shipping options are not available for PO box addresses as these require a signature at a physical location.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy from the date of delivery. Items must be unused, in original condition, and in original packaging with tags attached. To initiate a return, log into your account, go to Order History, select the items to return, and print your prepaid return label. Return shipping is free for defective items; otherwise, a $6.99 fee is deducted from your refund.

questions.question: How long does it take to get a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned item. The refund will be issued to your original payment method. Please allow an additional 3-5 business days for the refund to appear in your account, depending on your bank or card issuer.

questions.question: Can I exchange an item for a different size or color?
questions.answer: We do not offer direct exchanges. If you need a different size, color, or item, please return the original item for a refund and place a new order for the item you want. This ensures you get your preferred item as quickly as possible.

questions.question: What items cannot be returned?
questions.answer: The following items cannot be returned: opened personal care items, underwear and intimate apparel, digital downloads and software, gift cards, custom or personalized items, and perishable goods. Items marked as final sale or clearance are also non-returnable.

questions.question: What if I received a damaged or defective item?
questions.answer: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us within 7 days of delivery with photos of the damage. We will provide a prepaid return label at no cost and issue a full refund or send a replacement immediately. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

questions.question: Can I return an item after 30 days?
questions.answer: Returns initiated after the 30-day window may be accepted at our discretion on a case-by-case basis and may be subject to a 20% restocking fee. Please contact our customer service team to discuss your situation.

questions.question: How do I return an international order?
questions.answer: International customers are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees. We recommend using a trackable shipping service. Once we receive the returned item, we will process your refund according to our standard refund timeline.

questions.question: How do I know if an item is in stock?
questions.answer: Product availability is displayed on each product page in real-time. If an item shows 'In Stock', it's available for immediate shipment. 'Low Stock' means limited quantities remain. 'Out of Stock' items cannot be purchased at this time. You can sign up for restock notifications on out-of-stock items.

questions.question: Can I backorder an out-of-stock item?
questions.answer: Some items may be available for backorder. If backorder is available, you'll see that option on the product page with an estimated availability date. You won't be charged for backordered items until they ship. Backorder dates are estimates and may change.

questions.question: Do you offer product warranties?
questions.answer: Many of our products come with manufacturer warranties, typically 1-2 years for electronics and appliances. Warranty terms are specified on product pages. To initiate a warranty claim, contact our customer service team with your proof of purchase. Extended warranty options are available at checkout for eligible items.

questions.question: Are your product images accurate?
questions.answer: We strive to display accurate product images and descriptions. However, colors may vary slightly due to screen settings and photography lighting. If you receive an item that doesn't match the description or images, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund.

questions.question: Can I get product recommendations?
questions.answer: Yes! You can browse our curated collections, check out our 'Customers Also Bought' suggestions, or contact our customer service team for personalized recommendations based on your needs and preferences.

questions.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
questions.answer: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders easily, save addresses, view order history, manage returns, and receive exclusive member offers.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password. If you don't receive the email within 10 minutes, check your spam folder.

questions.question: Is my personal information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take your privacy and security seriously. We use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your data. We do not store complete credit card information on our servers, and we never sell your personal information to third parties. See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

questions.question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
questions.answer: You can unsubscribe from marketing emails by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any promotional email, or by logging into your account and updating your email preferences. Please note you'll still receive transactional emails about your orders.

questions.question: How can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: You can reach us by phone at 1-800-SHOP-EASE (Monday-Friday 8am-8pm EST, Saturday-Sunday 9am-6pm EST), email us at support@shopease.com (response within 24 hours), use live chat on our website (Monday-Friday 8am-8pm EST), or message us on social media @ShopEaseHelp.

questions.question: What are your customer service hours?
questions.answer: Our phone and live chat support are available Monday-Friday from 8am-8pm EST and Saturday-Sunday from 9am-6pm EST. Email support is available 24/7 with responses within 24 hours. Social media support is monitored during business hours with responses within 2-4 hours.

questions.question: Do you have a satisfaction guarantee?
questions.answer: Yes! We stand behind our products and service. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund. We're committed to making things right if you experience any issues.

questions.question: Do you sell gift cards?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer digital gift cards in amounts from $25 to $500. Gift cards are delivered via email and can be used for any purchase on our website. They never expire and have no fees.

questions.question: How do I use a promo code?
questions.answer: Enter your promo code in the 'Promo Code' field at checkout before completing your purchase. Click 'Apply' and the discount will be reflected in your order total. Promo codes are case-sensitive and cannot be applied to past orders.

questions.question: How do I check my gift card balance?
questions.answer: You can check your gift card balance by entering the gift card number on our Gift Card Balance page or by contacting customer service. The balance will also be displayed when you apply the gift card at checkout.

sample_queries: What's the status of my order?
I want to check on order number ORD10001
voice_query_scenarios.sample_bot_response: I can help you track your order. I need your order number to look that up. It starts with 'ORD' and can be found in your confirmation email. What's your order number?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_follow_up: Your order ORD10001 has been shipped via FedEx. The tracking number is TRK789456123. It's currently in transit and estimated to arrive on January 13th, 2026. Would you like me to send the tracking details to your email?

sample_queries: Tell me about the wireless headphones
What features does the fitness watch have?
Do you have any yoga mats?
How much is the coffee maker?
What colors do the headphones come in?
Is the standing desk in stock?
What's the battery life on the fitness watch?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_bot_response: I'd be happy to help you learn about our products! We have several great wireless headphones. Are you interested in the Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro by SoundWave?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_follow_up: The Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro are priced at $129.99. They feature active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and touch controls. They come in Black, Silver, and Rose Gold. They're currently in stock with over 1,200 customer reviews averaging 4.5 stars. Would you like to know more about these headphones or hear about other options?

sample_queries: How long do I have to return an item?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_bot_response: We offer a 30-day return policy from the date of delivery. Items must be unused and in original condition with all packaging and tags. To start a return, log into your account, go to Order History, select the items, and print your prepaid return label. Return shipping is free for defective items, otherwise there's a $6.99 fee deducted from your refund. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item. Is there a specific item you're looking to return?

voice_query_scenarios.user_intent: Learn about shipping options and costs
sample_queries: What shipping options do you have?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_bot_response: We offer several shipping options. Standard shipping is $5.99 for orders under $50, but it's FREE for orders $50 and above, taking 5-7 business days. Express shipping is $12.99 and takes 2-3 business days. Overnight shipping is $24.99 for next-day delivery. We also ship internationally to select destinations. Which shipping option interests you?

voice_query_scenarios.user_intent: Check if product is in stock
sample_queries: Is the standing desk in stock?
Do you have the yoga mat available?
When will the coffee maker be back in stock?
Do you have this in black?
voice_query_scenarios.sample_bot_response: I can check that for you! Which product are you interested in?
